rule.name: MethodScopeMissing
rule.description: No scope modifier specified for function "%s

rule.name: FunctionCommentSpacingBeforeParams
rule.description: Parameters must appear immediately after the comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentMissing
rule.description: Missing function doc comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentWrongStyle
rule.description: You must use "/**" style comments for a function comment

rule.name: ClassCommentWrongStyle
rule.description: You must use "/**" style comments for a %s comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentSpacingBeforeShort
rule.description: Extra newline(s) found before function comment short description

rule.name: ControlStructuresControlSignature
rule.description: Incorrect control signature

rule.name: FunctionCommentEmptyReturn
rule.description: @return tag is empty in function comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentSpacingBeforeParamType
rule.description: Expected 1 space before variable type

rule.name: ClassCommentTagIndent
rule.description: Incorrect tag indentation in class comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentParameterCommentsNotAligned
rule.description: The comments for parameters %s (%s) and %s (%s) do not align

rule.name: FunctionCommentSpacingBeforeTags
rule.description: There must be exactly one blank line before the tags in function comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentMissingParamTag
rule.description: Doc comment for "%s" missing

rule.name: FunctionCommentParamNameNoMatch
rule.description: Param name does not match function comment

rule.name: ClassCommentMissing
rule.description: Missing %s doc comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentMissingParamComment
rule.description: Missing comment for param "%s" at position %s

rule.name: FunctionCommentMissingReturnType
rule.description: Return type missing for @return tag in function comment

rule.name: FunctionCommentSpacingAfterParams
rule.description: Last parameter comment requires a blank newline after it

rule.name: FunctionCommentParameterNamesNotAligned
rule.description: The variable names for parameters %s (%s) and %s (%s) do not align

rule.name: FunctionCommentSpacingAfterLongName
rule.description: Expected 1 space after the longest variable name

rule.name: FunctionCommentMissingParamName
rule.description: Missing parameter name at position '.$po

rule.name: FunctionCommentExtraParamComment
rule.description: Superfluous doc comment at position '.$po

rule.name: ClassCommentSpacingBeforeTags
rule.description: There must be exactly one blank line before the tags in %s comments

rule.name: ClassCommentSpacingBeforeShort
rule.description: Extra newline(s) found before %s comment short description

rule.name: FunctionCommentMissingReturn
rule.description: Missing @return tag in function comment
